description: Here are some of my real-world full stack projects that showcase my ability to build scalable, modern and user-focused applications.
project_desc_1: A full stack platform for pet adoption with authentication, protected routes, match system and pet management.
project_features_1: Pet registry and adoption match system
Responsive UI built with React and Tailwind
project_desc_2: E-commerce platform with secure payments, product management and automated order system.
project_desc_3: SaaS platform for freelancers with authentication, role system, project management and dashboards.
project_features_3: Built with Next.js, Prisma and PostgreSQL
project_desc_4: A platform where users can exchange skills, connect with others, schedule sessions and manage learning categories.
project_features_4: Built with React, Node.js and PostgreSQL
